additionalInput.AltKey: =IF(%body:Message:MessageType% == "TaskCreation",%body:Message:B2B Action PM Workbench Thin BC:AltKey%,%body:SiebelMessage:ListOfB2B PMW Create Task IO:B2B Action PM Workbench Thin BC:AltKey%)
additionalInput.B2BOutcome: =IF(%body:Message:MessageType% == "TaskCreation",%body:Message:B2B Action PM Workbench Thin BC:B2BOutcome%,%body:SiebelMessage:ListOfB2B PMW Create Task IO:B2B Action PM Workbench Thin BC:B2BOutcome%)
additionalInput.OMTaskId: =IF(%body:Message:MessageType% == "TaskCreation",%body:Message:B2B Action PM Workbench Thin BC:OMTaskId%,%body:SiebelMessage:ListOfB2B PMW Create Task IO:B2B Action PM Workbench Thin BC:OMTaskId%)
additionalInput.RecordTypeId: =IF(%body:Message:B2B Action PM Workbench Thin BC:OMTaskId%=='T001' || %body:SiebelMessage:ListOfB2B PMW Create Task IO:B2B Action PM Workbench Thin BC:OMTaskId%=='T001',%GetOrderDetails:RecordTypeId%,'')
additionalInput.TaskName: =IF(%body:Message:MessageType% == "TaskCreation",%body:Message:B2B Action PM Workbench Thin BC:Task Name%,%body:SiebelMessage:ListOfB2B PMW Create Task IO:B2B Action PM Workbench Thin BC:Task Name%)
additionalInput.TaskType: =IF(%body:Message:MessageType% == "TaskCreation",%body:Message:B2B Action PM Workbench Thin BC:TaskType%,%body:SiebelMessage:ListOfB2B PMW Create Task IO:B2B Action PM Workbench Thin BC:TaskType%)
